title: srI paramEsvari
sahitya:
shrI paramEshvari dEvi gauri shrta janAvanE vilAsini



anupallavi



shrIpati sOdarim simha vAhini shrI cakra tADanga divya bhUSaNi



caraNam



sharaNAgata sajjana pAlini sArasapAdE campaka mAlini suravara

pUjitE svayamprakAshini harikEshapriyE ambA pAlisau
